titles.title: I Want to Break Through -- extra verses

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
I'm going to break through.
I'm going to break through.
I'll know as I'm known; I'll know you alone.
I'm going to break through.
Now there's no sin that can stand in the way.
I will enter in; you've opened the way.
I'll see your glory, I'll see your face.
I'm going to break through.

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
When I was a child, I thought as a child,
And childish things I longed for.
But when I grew up, childish things I laid aside.
And now, you're calling me to something deeper.
Though now dimly I see, you're coming in me,
And I shall break through.
